page.title: 04THEALE COMMERCIAL ESTATE
page.content: This is a small development of light industrial warehouse units which was built in 1983 and 1984 on a site adjacent to the Prestcold works in Station Road Theale. The site is owned by Norwich Union, an insurance company and was built as twelve units each including a limited amount of office accomodation. Most of the units are occupied and include a variety of different industries (Chemicals, Metals, Printing etc.). Some of the units have been combined to form larger units. The largest unit of some 60,000 sq.ft. remains unoccupied. Theale Commercial Estate is well located being close to Junction 12 of the M4 Motorway which provides first-class links to most parts of the country including London and its Heathrow airport. Theale railway station is also nearby.
